pullRequest.title: Add additional logging to SLM retention task
pullRequest.bodyText:
This commit adds more logging to the actions that the SLM retention task does. It will help in the
event that we need to diagnose any additional issues or problems while running retention.

commit.message:
Add additional logging to SLM retention task

This commit adds more logging to the actions that the SLM retention task does. It will help in the
event that we need to diagnose any additional issues or problems while running retention.

nodes.bodyText: is this needed? the logger.error above will print a message already
